mapper.sql: USERCODE, EMAIL, MOBILE, PASSWORD, NAME, GENDOR, BRANCH, DEPARTMENT, STATE, ADMINFLAG, to_char(PSWEXPIREDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') PSWEXPIREDATE, to_char(LASTLOGINDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') LASTLOGINDATE, to_char(MAKEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') MAKEDATE, MAKEUSER, to_char(MODIFYDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') MODIFYDATE, MODIFYUSER
mapper.select:
select
from cms_user where 1=1
and (USERCODE = #{usercode} or EMAIL=#{usercode} or MOBILE=#{usercode} or NAME=#{usercode})
mapper.insert: insert into cms_user (USERCODE, EMAIL, MOBILE, PASSWORD, NAME, GENDOR, BRANCH, DEPARTMENT, STATE, ADMINFLAG, PSWEXPIREDATE, LASTLOGINDATE, MAKEDATE, MAKEUSER, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYUSER) values (#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pswexpiredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastlogindate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{makedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{makeuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

USERCODE,
EMAIL,
MOBILE,

NAME,

BRANCH,
DEPARTMENT,
STATE,
ADMINFLAG,

to_date(#{lastlogindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{makedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),

mapper.update:
update cms_user
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDOR = #{gendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMINFLAG = #{adminflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSWEXPIREDATE = to_date(#{pswexpiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
LASTLOGINDATE = to_date(#{lastlogindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
MAKEDATE = to_date(#{makedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
MAKEUSER = #{makeuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYDATE = to_date(#{modifydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USERCODE = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cms_user set EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDOR = #{gendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMINFLAG = #{adminflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSWEXPIREDATE = #{pswexpiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTLOGINDATE = #{lastlogindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAKEDATE = #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAKEUSER = #{makeuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USERCODE = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
